name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience in cloud infrastructure and application deployment, specializing in **AWS**, **Terraform**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and monitoring solutions such as **Prometheus** and **Grafana**. Proficient in configuration management using **Chef**, orchestration with **Ansible**, and data management with **Redis** and **Elasticsearch**. Strong expertise in **incident response** and **monitoring**, ensuring high availability and performance in cloud-native environments.

Skilled in scripting with **Bash** and programming in **Python** and **Ruby**, complemented by hands-on experience in deploying AI/ML-powered applications leveraging **FastAPI** and **Django**. Well-versed in compliance-driven development standards, including HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring secure and reliable solutions in the healthcare and financial industries. Proven ability to implement CI/CD pipelines to streamline development processes.
